name: belgrade
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Serbia, in the northern part of the country: The news began with a report on the reopening of a chemical plant outside Belgrade. She signed up for a part-time finance degree last September at a Belgrade university.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Belgrade the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Belgrade.Saint Sava, a huge white marble church topped by a domed roof and a glittering cross visible from all over Belgrade, reeked of incense amid the murmur of chorused prayers.
